SECRET_KEY.description: A secret key for encryption used on this application.

ENVIRONMENT.description: An environmental variable indicating which set of settings to use. Leave this as 'heroku'

TIME_ZONE.description: The timezone the server will be based out of. See the list of valid values here: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_tz_database_time_zones

APP_HOST_NAME.description: <App Name as entered above>.herokuapp.com. For Example: my-heroku-app-name.herokuapp.com

STARTING_URL.description: Enter a fully qualified URL you would like to start crawling. This will be used for initial configuration. For Example: https://parenting.nytimes.com/

scripts.postdeploy: python manage.py migrate && python manage.py loaddata sitecomber/apps/config/fixtures/initial_user_data.json
